versos: (shemesh) Jeremiah 8:2 - "They will be exposed to the sun and the moon and all the stars of the heavens, which they have loved and served and which they have followed and consulted and worshiped. They will not be gathered up or buried, but will be like dung lying on the ground.";;;
(revealed) Romans 1:17 - For in the gospel the righteousness of God is revealeda righteousness that is by faith from first to last
(dismayed) Isaiah 41:10 - "So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.";;;
(troubles) Psalm 34:19 - "Many are the troubles of the righteous, but the Lord delivers him from them all.";;;
(drop) Job 36:27 - "He draws up the drops of water, which distill as rain to the streams.";;;
(showers) Ezekiel 34:26 - "I will make them and the places surrounding my hill a blessing. I will send down showers in season; there will be showers of blessing.";;;
(crooked) Proverbs 2:15 - "whose paths are crooked and who are devious in their ways.";;;
(foolish) Proverbs 12:15 - "The way of a fool is right in his own eyes, but a wise man listens to advice.";;;
(howling) Isaiah 13:22 - "Hyenas will howl in her strongholds, jackals in her luxurious palaces. Her time is at hand, and her days will not be prolonged.";;;

(egyptian) Exodus 11:3 - "And the Lord gave the people favor in the sight of the Egyptians. Moreover, the man Moses was very great in the land of Egypt, in the sight of Pharaoh's servants and in the sight of the people.";;;
(stirreth) Hebrews 10:24 - "And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works:";;;
(forsook) Matthew 27:46 - "And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani that is to say, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me";;;
(froward) Proverbs 3:32 - "For the froward is abomination to the Lord: but his secret is with the righteous.";;;
(vanities) Psalm 31:6 - "I hate those who pay regard to worthless idols, but I trust in the Lord.";;;
(lowest) Luke 1:52 - "He has brought down rulers from their thrones but has lifted up the humble.";;;
(hell) Matthew 5:22 - But I tell you that anyone who is angry with a brother or sister will be subject to judgment. Again
(spend) 2 Corinthians 12:15 - "I will most gladly spend and be spent for your souls.";;;
